ai-thag4.5:1.4_0: I tore out my hair and beard.
ai-thag4.5:2.4_0: I didn’t accept food set aside for me.
ai-thag4.5:3.1_0: I did many deeds of this kind,
ai-thag4.5:3.2_0: which lead to a bad destination.
ai-thag4.5:3.3_0: Swept away by a great flood,
ai-thag4.5:3.4_0: I went to the Buddha as a refuge.
ai-thag4.5:4.2_0: Just one rainy season after I went forth,
